name: OpenCodeAgent
description: Run OpenCode (https://opencode.ai/) in your Azure DevOps pipelines. Use review mode for automated PR review or command mode for comment-triggered runs.
helpMarkDown: Runs an OpenCode AI agent against the current pull request. In review mode agent . In command mode it responds to /oc or /opencode comments and can commit changes. See https://opencode.ai for provider/model options.
author: trojanmartin

inputs.name: pat
inputs.label: Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure DevOps PAT with Code Read (and Write for command mode commits) and Pull Request Threads Read & Write scopes. You may use $(System.AccessToken) if the build service has these permissions.

inputs.name: organization
inputs.label: Organization
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure DevOps organization name. Auto-detected from System.CollectionUri if omitted.

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure DevOps project name. Auto-detected from System.TeamProject if omitted.

inputs.name: commentUrl
inputs.label: Comment URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full URL to the PR comment that triggered this run. Format: https://dev.azure.com/{org}/_apis/git/repositories/{repoId}/pullRequests/{prId}/threads/{threadId}/comments/{commentId}. Required for command mode or when mode is not explicitly set.

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: Model to use
inputs.helpMarkDown: Model to use. Must be in the format 'provider/model', e.g., 'openai/gpt-4.1'.

inputs.name: agent
inputs.label: Agent
inputs.helpMarkDown: OpenCode agent to run, if omitted opencode default agent is used.

inputs.name: mode
inputs.label: Execution Mode

options.command: Command - Execute agent with user's command
options.review: Review - Perform code review of PR changes

inputs.helpMarkDown: Execution mode. 'review' runs headless PR review without a trigger comment. 'command' responds to /oc or /opencode comments. Leave blank to auto-detect from the comment.

inputs.name: skipClone
inputs.label: Skip Git Clone
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip cloning the repository. When true, workspacePath must point to an existing checkout.

inputs.name: workspacePath
inputs.label: Workspace Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory for the repository workspace. Defaults to $(Build.BinariesDirectory) or $(Agent.TempDirectory). Required when skipClone is true.

inputs.name: reviewPrompt
inputs.label: Review Prompt
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom instructions for the code review (review mode only). Replaces the default review criteria. The script execution instructions and PR context are always included automatically. Example: 'Review for security vulnerabilities, focusing on SQL injection and XSS attacks.'
